section.name: Aims
section.p: As different individuals may be filling the role of Release Manager for the Math project at different times. This documentation is provided as a means of organizing release procedures such that releases can maintain consistency.

section.name: Guidelines
section.p: Math Project Releases are primarily facilitated using Maven's 'dist' and 'jar' goals to build releases in tar.gz, zip and jar archive formats. Additional goals and processes have been added using the included maven.xml file in the root directory.
